net.hockeyapp.android.utils

Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.utils.ImageUtils

  • public class ImageUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    Various functions related to image loading and bitmap scaling.

    • Method Detail

      • determineOrientation

        public static int determineOrientation(java.io.File file)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Determines the orientation of the image based on its ratio.
        Parameters:
        file - the file handle of the image
        Returns:
        The image orientation, either ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT or ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file couldn't be processed

      • determineOrientation

        public static int determineOrientation(android.content.Context context,
                                       android.net.Uri uri)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Determines the orientation of the image based on its ratio.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        uri - the URI of the image
        Returns:
        The image orientation, either ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT or ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the URI couldn't be processed

      • determineOrientation

        public static int determineOrientation(java.io.InputStream input)
        Determines the orientation of the image based on its ratio.
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream of the image
        Returns:
        The image orientation, either ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT or ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE.

      • decodeSampledBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmap(java.io.File file,
                                                          int reqWidth,
                                                          int reqHeight)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Decodes the image as a bitmap with a size as small as possible but with a minimum size of given reqWidth and reqHeight. Based on: http://developer.android.com/training/displaying-bitmaps/load-bitmap.html
        Parameters:
        file - the file handle of the image
        reqWidth - required width
        reqHeight - required height
        Returns:
        decoded the decoded bitmap
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the URI couldn't be processed

      • decodeSampledBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                                          android.net.Uri imageUri,
                                                          int reqWidth,
                                                          int reqHeight)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Decodes the image as a bitmap with a size as small as possible but with a minimum size of given reqWidth and reqHeight. Based on: http://developer.android.com/training/displaying-bitmaps/load-bitmap.html
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        imageUri - the URI of the image
        reqWidth - required width
        reqHeight - required height
        Returns:
        decoded the decoded bitmap
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the URI couldn't be processed
